Project description

Bleak Retry Connector

A connector for Bleak Clients that handles transient connection failures

Installation

Install this via pip (or your favourite package manager):

pip install bleak-retry-connector

Contributors ✨

Thanks goes to these wonderful people (emoji key):

This project follows the all-contributors specification. Contributions of any kind welcome!

Credits

This package was created withCookiecutter and thebrowniebroke/cookiecutter-pypackageproject template.
